programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: When most people think of dishes like lasagna and jambalaya, they think of labor-intensive weekend meals. In this episode, however, we develop versions that could be prepared on a busy weeknight.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Two old-fashioned dishes with modern appeal: Boston baked beans and chicken and dumplings. Neither requires fancy ingredients or expensive equipment, just a little time and effort.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: What's for Sunday dinner? Around many American tables, it's meat and potatoes. Beef brisket is a good choice and a nice change from pot roast or beef stew. Although inexpensive and simple to prepare, brisket does pose some challenges to the cook.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: There are certain dinners we rely on again and again. We are particularly fond of roasting chicken and potatoes together in one pan. While the chicken roasts, its juices drip onto the potatoes, giving them a wonderfully rich crust and creamy flavor.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Thanksgiving can strike fear into the heart of even the most proficient cook. However with our turkey and sweet potato casserole recipes, we minimize the work so that the cook can enjoy the holiday as much as everyone else.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We develop a foolproof preparation for pork chops with vinegar and peppers—a modern version tangy and juicy enough to rival that prepared by an Italian grandmother. Next, we turn to pan-roasted pork tenderloin.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Tuna, which is often served rare to medium-rare, can be particularly tricky to get just right with a nicely seared crust. As for halibut, we developed a technique that ensured perfect texture without a loss of flavor.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Some people are intimidated by the thought of preparing fish. Traditional dishes, like Fish Meunière, can seem even more daunting. But you don't need to be wearing a toque to prepare this French classic well.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Most Italian recipes seem startlingly easy to prepare, requiring just a few simple ingredients. But some dishes need special care to reach their full potential. In this episode, we demystify two Italian classics: Fettuccine Alfredo and Beef in Barolo.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we prepare an Indian-inspired shrimp curry and a Thai-inspired green curry with chicken.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: When you eat chicken frequently, it pays to have a number of preparations on hand. In this episode, we turn to orange-flavored chicken and chicken teriyaki.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: One of our favorite Spanish dishes is paella. But with a lengthy ingredient list the shopping alone can give the home cook pause. We take a hard look at paella to see if we can pare back this dish to its humble origins without losing its alluring flavors.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We set out to develop a hassle-free pizza recipe especially for the grill—one we hope will become a new backyard barbecue favorite.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Pork loin is delicious roasted in the oven, but it takes on a new character when cooked on the grill. The fire imparts a delicate smokiness to the meat, and the heat creates a handsome crust. French potato salad is a perfect counterpoint to the pork.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We wanted to develop a recipe for pulled pork that rivals that of the best barbecue joints but won't be an all-day affair. We pair the pork with another barbecue classic—cornbread.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: If you're a fan of saucy barbecued chicken, you'll love pulled chicken. Similar to the more traditional pulled pork, it's simply tender shreds of smoky grilled chicken moistened with barbecue sauce.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Summer desserts are all about fruit. As inviting as a bowl of sweet berries can be, there's something about baked fruit desserts that we can't resist. In this episode we take a look at two summer favorites: blueberry cobbler and free-form fruit tart.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: With its impressive mounds of tender, juicy apples and melt-in-your-mouth pastry crust, deep-dish apple pie should take your breath away. Creating a pie with such a high volume of filling does, however, pose challenges.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: There seems to be a cookie to fit any occasion or mood. In this episode we look at two from opposite ends of the style spectrum—the thick, homey oatmeal and the dainty, elegant spritz.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: In this episode, we aim to resurrect the traditional birthday cake. We've developed an honest-to-goodness layer cake with an old-fashioned jam filling and real butter frosting—the type of cake guaranteed to put a smile on anyone's face.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: German chocolate cake—filled with sticky pecans and coconut—is not without flaws. We set out to develop a German chocolate cake that avoids the common pitfalls and delivers on its promise.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We set out to make a meatloaf with well-seasoned meat and just enough binder to give the loaf a tender, not tough, texture. In choosing a side dish to partner with our meatloaf, we turned to another old-fashioned dish—skillet-roasted potatoes.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Dinners prepared entirely in one skillet are perfect for weeknight cooking. Less cleanup is one obvious benefit. A skillet also gives the cook a bit more control over cooking multiple elements.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Beef, beer, and onions have a natural affinity—it's one reason burgers and onion rings are often on bar menus. In a carbonnade, the beef melds with the soft sweetness of sliced onions in a lightly thickened broth that is rich, deep, and satisfying.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We wanted a streamlined version of roast chicken with plenty of stuffing to go around. First, we needed to solve the problem of cooking the stuffing to a safe temperature without drying out the delicate breast meat of the chicken.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: Boneless pork chops are lean and quick-cooking, making them ideal for weeknight meals. Pork tenderloin, which is also lean, has a somewhat fussy reputation, but you don't need to be a professional chef to cook tenderloin properly.

programme.title: America's Test Kitchen
programme.desc: We make a fresh-tasting, quick tamale pie with a juicy, spicy mixture of meat and vegetables and a quick homemade-cornbread topping. We also show you how to cook up a really flavorful chicken stew topped with a biscuit crust.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Músculo
programme.desc: Jamie es cuestionado por la muerte de un pandillero que perseguía. Baez se infiltra para investigar al prometido de la ex de Danny, quien vende drogas desde su gimnasio.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Apuestas mortales
programme.desc: Un oficial es acusado de usar fuerza excesiva, lo que pone al departamento bajo escrutinio. Danny y Maria investigan el asesinato de un corredor de valores endeudado.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: El equipo es cuestionado por un Comité del Senado a raíz de la pérdida de Prentiss. Mientras, una cara familiar regresa de forma inesperada para ayudar al equipo a con este caso.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC es llamada a Oklahoma cuando unas mujeres están siendo asesinadas, después de ser torturadas con ácido sulfúrico.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC investiga un asesinato masivo en una empresa de seguridad de Internet en las cercanías de Charlottesville, pero las pistas revelan que no es un asesino en serie normal.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: El equipo UAC viaja a Idaho, donde un asesino en serie fija como objetivo a los sobrevivientes de la masacre de la secundaria Boise de hace 10 años.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: París
programme.desc: Cuando la testigo estrella del gobierno en un caso de malversación es objetivo de un asesino, depende del equipo ayudarla a llegar a casa con vida.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Farsa
programme.desc: El equipo se encuentra en una carrera contrarreloj cuando un grupo terrorista amenaza con detonar una bomba radioactiva en la zona de Washington.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Navaja
programme.desc: Cuando un marine es encontrado muerto, Gibbs, Fornell y el equipo se dirigen a la carretera para detener una operación ilegal de camiones.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval: Día de las madres
programme.desc: Los secretos surgen cuando la ex suegra de Gibbs aparece como testigo en la investigación de un asesinato.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Apuestas mortales
programme.desc: Un oficial es acusado de usar fuerza excesiva, lo que pone al departamento bajo escrutinio. Danny y Maria investigan el asesinato de un corredor de valores endeudado.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Se hace justicia
programme.desc: Después de la cena de Frank con el abogado mafioso Angelo Gallo, este es tiroteado y Frank escapa por poco. Mientras, Danny es llamado para servir en un jurado y termina siendo la única opinión disidente en un juicio por asesinato.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Mala sangre
programme.desc: Danny y Baez investigan un homicidio con el hermano de Baez como sospechoso. Frank se entera de que un oficial canino condecorado es acusado de brutalidad policial.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Error de identidad
programme.desc: Danny y Maria investigan un atentado local, pero enfrentan tensión y resistencia de la comunidad. Mientras, Frank debe lidiar con las consecuencias políticas cuando un hombre golpea a un oficial que fue demasiado agresivo en su interrogatorio.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police deploy spike strips to put an end to a dangerous stolen vehicle pursuit. An alleged mechanic says he has permission to drive a semi-truck — the owner says otherwise. A couple stops a woman from driving away in their car.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: When the cuffs come out, an emotional cyclist gives deputies the runaround. A boyfriend’s honesty saves his girlfriend from going to jail on her birthday. Police investigate a case of road rage involving a possible gun.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A runaway cyclist dips into a house to catch his breath. A deputy tries to cut a man some slack despite his mistakes. The owners of an empty house call the police when they hear someone else inside.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A pair of suspects on the run pretend they were busy napping. A man reaches for something in his pocket, but denies knowing what it is. A family calls the police after their roommate brandishes a gun.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A deputy tries to cut a guy some slack after his relationship troubles got out of hand. A teenager gets a serious lesson in not drinking while underage. A couple is forced to take a raincheck on their wedding day.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: During a traffic stop, a driver drops off his passenger before speeding away. Deputies are amazed when a man offers them an ID that looks nothing like him. Deputies investigate a case of road rage involving a gun.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man with multiple felony warrants gets one last taste of freedom before heading to prison. A speeding driver is arrested for the same thing he was arrested for the day before. A runaway suspect leaves a trail behind him.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A very cooperative car thief tells deputies all about his good fortune. An argument over business leaves one man on the ground with a bloody mouth. The occupants of a truck are oblivious to what deputies find in the backseat.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A cyclist allegedly mistakes a deputy for a thief and tries to escape into the bushes. Police cut a dad some slack by not towing the family car. Two sisters catch the police’s attention when they take their spat to the road.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An elderly driver sacrifices his own van during his desperate escape attempt. A traffic stop on a suspended driver turns up more than anticipated. Several car occupants learn it’s better to tell the truth from the start.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies gradually get to the bottom of a possible stolen vehicle. A woman asks the police to help her make a clean break from bad habits. A single woman tries to plan a date with an online suitor, but the night quickly goes awry.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A family gets a huge scare when a fleeing suspect finds his way into their house. Police sort out a chaotic argument between two childhood friends. A woman in a suspicious vehicle plays fast and loose with the truth.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: The owner of a stolen truck calls officers when he spots it in a nearby alley. A fleeing driver leads officers on a wild chase over a closed bridge. Police track down a suspect who gave a liquor store employee a phony $100 bill.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A father-to-be kicks off a dangerous vehicle pursuit over something trivial. A car that ducked out of a DUI checkpoint attracts attention. Officers respond to a disturbance caused by a local man’s erratic behavior.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies catch up to a group of teenagers enjoying a night of joyriding. A traffic stop opens the doors to recovery for a very repentant suspect. A suspect insists his car is not stolen because he did his online research.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Recovery of a stolen vehicle uncovers a weapon and a lengthy criminal history. Detectives cross paths with a car that was stolen in a carjacking. Officers speak with a man who has questionable standards regarding gun safety.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man and woman are pulled over while out on a candy run. A simple traffic violation turns into a multi-vehicle police pursuit. Deputies are notified of a stolen car and find the driver in possession of an interesting tool.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A distinctive tattoo reveals a wanted felon’s true identity. Deputies talk to a young woman who traded one bad habit for another. A man in possession of a stolen vehicle tells officers how his day went from bad to worse.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man receives an enormous break due to public health concerns. Officers are doubtful when two friends claim they were unaware of each other’s actions. Police pull over a car full of people who know very little about themselves.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A car chase involves tire spikes, shredded rubber, and crashed gates. Suspects accused of burglary state they only steal to pay rent. A traffic stop proves there’s always more than meets the eye.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect tries to outrun the law by bicycle but can’t out pedal police. A deputy goes undercover to investigate stolen baseballs. A K-9 discovers hidden contraband on a suspect’s most private places.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A seatbelt violation ends in a chase to the confusion of all involved. A suspect with a history of grand theft auto is found in another stolen car. Officers find drugs in a tough part of town.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers smell the pungent odor of marijuana during a minor traffic violation. Cocaine is found on a suspect pulled over for a broken windshield. A store is robbed by someone in a red dress.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man accused of burglary claims he’s hallucinating. A suspect tries to show off by parading his white pistol and causes pandemonium. A traffic stop offers an accused man a second chance.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: It’s all deputies and dogs on deck in an attempt to subdue a man in distress. A suspect proves to be too sleepy to engage in truck thievery. A baby is rescued in a car with no air conditioning.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers apprehend an individual with a saw-like knife. A man accused of auto theft claims his girlfriend allowed him to borrow her wheels. Chiquita the chihuahua helps its owner through hard times.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Stop sticks are deployed to intercept a vehicle with bullets. Two suspects watch their life unravel after being found with meth. Police assist young and restless runaways.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When Nick, Greg and Hodges take Henry to celebrate his birthday at a biker bar, they uncover a double homicide and find several suspects still at the bar who may be the murderers.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A major shootout at a gun store may be connected to the death of a young woman involved in a suicide pact.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Two beautiful women are murdered in a Las Vegas hotel and the CSIs uncover an unusual killer during their investigation.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSI team delves into the world of professional golf when the body of a legendary player is discovered during a high-profile tournament.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The case of two high school students, one dead and one missing, lead the CSIs into the underbelly of streetcar racing and a tangled web of deadly competition.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Rascal Flatts takes center stage when a band member is electrocuted by his own guitar during a concert, the CSI team investigates if it was a case of foul play.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When a young boy is found murdered, the CSI team uncovers evidence that may link his death to an old case that recently resurfaced.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Catherine and Detective Vartann are thrown together in a hotel room for 24 hours as they stake out a duo making drugs in the room next door.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When the CSI team investigates the brutal murder of a family, they trace the killer to the house next door, which might belong to the "Dr. Jekyll" serial killer.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When Hodges and Wendy take a group of high school CSI Explorer Scouts on a field trip, they embellish their role in solving cases and take their assignment a little bit too far.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: When a student is discovered murdered at Lindsey's school, the investigation takes a sharp turn when the CSIs uncover an unlikely connection between the boy's death and atrocities of the past.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A legendary comic from the good old days of Las Vegas is set to reunite with his partner on stage for one night only, until one half of the famous duo is found dead.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A mother thought to be grieving for the loss of her family three years ago becomes a suspect in a CSI investigation.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSI team must investigate one of their own when Langston is accused by a former colleague of being part of the Dr. Jekyll murders, on part one of a two-part season finale.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando Nick, Greg y Hodges llevan a Henry a celebrar su cumpleaños a un bar de motociclistas, descubren un doble homicidio y encuentran a varios sospechosos todavía en el bar que pueden ser los asesinos.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Un gran tiroteo en una tienda de armas puede estar relacionado con la muerte de una mujer joven involucrada en un pacto suicida.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Dos hermosas mujeres son asesinadas en un hotel de Las Vegas y los CSI descubren a un asesino inusual durante su investigación.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI se adentra en el mundo del golf profesional cuando se descubre el cuerpo de un jugador legendario durante un torneo de alto nivel.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El caso de dos estudiantes de secundaria, uno muerto y el otro desaparecido, llevan a los CSI a unas carreras callejeras de coches y a su complicada red de competición mortal.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Rascal Flatts toma el centro del escenario cuando un miembro de la banda es electrocutado por su propia guitarra durante un concierto, el equipo de CSI investiga si fue un asesinato.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando un niño pequeño es encontrado asesinado, el equipo de CSI descubre evidencia que puede vincular su muerte con un viejo caso que resurgió recientemente.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Catherine y el detective Vartann pasan 24 horas juntos en una habitación de hotel mientras vigilan a un dúo que fabrica drogas en la habitación de al lado.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando el equipo de CSI investiga el brutal asesinato de una familia, rastrean al asesino hasta la casa de al lado, que podría pertenecer al asesino en serie "Dr. Jekyll".

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando Hodges y Wendy llevan a un grupo de exploradores de CSI de la escuela secundaria a una excursión, embellecen su papel en la resolución de casos y llevan su tarea un poco demasiado lejos.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Cuando un estudiante es descubierto asesinado en la escuela de Lindsey, la investigación da un giro brusco cuando el equipo de CSI descubre una conexión poco probable entre la muerte del niño y atrocidades del pasado.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Un cómico legendario de los viejos tiempos de Las Vegas se reunirá con su compañero en el escenario solo por una noche, hasta que uno de ellos es encontrado muerto.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Una madre que se pensaba que estaba de duelo por la pérdida de su familia hace tres años se convierte en sospechosa en una investigación de CSI.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI debe investigar a uno de los suyos cuando Langston es acusado por un antiguo colega de ser parte de los asesinatos del Dr. Jekyll. Primera parte de dos del final de temporada.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: An eight-year-old girl becomes the innocent pawn in an ugly and abusive game that ends in murder. Horatio and the CSI team investigate.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A high school reunion turns deadly when a classmate acts on a 15-year-old grudge, Horatio and Yelina discover that Ray may still be alive.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSI Team works against a ticking clock to find the purported accomplice in a years-old ax-murder case before the convicted killer is executed.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSI team races against time to locate and deactivate a radioactive bomb set to go off in the middle of downtown Miami.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and the CSI team face off with Miami’s notorious and deadly Mala Noche gang after a funeral becomes the scene of a murder.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A family boating accident reveals a sinister plot by grifters to heist 10 million dollars in gold bars. Horatio and the CSI team investigate.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team investigates the murder of a teenage girl partying in Miami on her way to the Bahamas with her high school class.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A young man faces life in prison – and possibly worse – unless Horatio can prove his innocence against insurmountable odds.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and the team race against time to find out who is trying to frame Horatio for the murder of a woman he’s been dating.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a "wives weekend" ends in murder, the CSI team is faced with three women whose separate trysts with the victim make them prime suspects

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The team works in tandem with NY CSI chief Mac Taylor to apprehend a serial killer before he kills the young girl he has just taken hostage

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Ryan Wolfe is attacked and seriously injured while investigating the murder of a distraught soon-to-be ex-wife, and there is no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and the CSI team must rely on a video game for their next clue as to where a group of young gunmen will strike next.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: The CSI team is hard-pressed to find the killer of an infamous drug lord, and a member of the team is investigated for drugs by Internal Affairs.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Mientras la vida de Delko pende de un hilo, Horatio vuelve 12 años en el tiempo para revelar cómo se conocieron y se convirtieron en un equipo los CSI de Miami.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando atacan el laboratorio, Horatio debe atender la única solicitud de un hombre armado para salvar a cinco rehenes, incluido el nuevo CSI Jesse Cardoza.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Tres jugadores de vóleibol caen muertos misteriosamente en la cancha mientras el testimonio de Calleigh contra Delko amenaza su futuro como CSI.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando el hombre más odiado de Miami es asesinado, Horatio Caine y el equipo de CSI van a la caza de su asesino y su tesoro escondido.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Alexx Woods y Eric Delko regresan para ayudar a Horatio Caine y al equipo de CSI a detener un brote viral mortal en la hermosa Miami.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio Caine y el equipo de CSI recrean una noche de libertinaje de una despedida de soltero para resolver un asesinato y encontrar a un novio desaparecido.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio Caine llama al Dr. Ray Langston del equipo de CSI de Las Vegas para que venga a Miami cuando se descubre una pierna amputada en los Everglades.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando Horatio y el equipo de CSI investigan quién o qué causó un horrible accidente de auto, se revelan los secretos más oscuros de ambos conductores.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: En la hermosa Miami, se están usando medusas mortales como arma asesina y regresa una misteriosa mujer del pasado de Jesse.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: La investigación sobre la muerte de un trabajador del censo coloca al equipo en una persecución de autos a alta velocidad y en una explosión que amenaza la vida de dos CSI.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Eric Delko regresa a Miami como testigo experto de la defensa y enfrenta a sus viejos amigos, Horatio y el equipo de CSI.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando la novia de Estados Unidos, Phoebe Nichols, arde en llamas durante un concierto, el equipo de CSI expone el lado oscuro del estrellato pop.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: El extraño caso de un hombre cortado por la mitad desconcierta a Horatio y al equipo de CSI, mientras que la lesión de Natalia pone a Ryan y a ella en peligro.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio y el equipo de CSI tienen 24 horas para descubrir si un hombre condenado a muerte es realmente culpable y Eric Delko vuelve a trabajar en el caso.

programme.desc: The CSI team investigates the death of a wealthy man in a hip nightclub and the inadvertent shooting of a young boy during a robbery.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates the murder of the owner of a posh hotel as well as the death of a teenager that seems to be connected to Peter Pan.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: After a young woman and a prominent judge are murdered, the CSI team works to discover the connection between the two crimes.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates the death of a street luger and the mysterious drowning of a woman in a self-sanitizing pay bathroom.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: When a trained female assassin comes to New York City, she really puts the CSI New York team members’ abilities to the test.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The kidnapping of a little girl and a fire set to her apartment building leaves CSI New York team member Stella feeling guilty and homeless.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A shark washes up on shore unloading a dead body and a bizarre crime scene that leaves the CSI New York team more than puzzled.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A high school dance is interrupted by the killing of the school’s guidance counselor. Meanwhile, the taxi cab serial killer is still on the loose.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A professional basketball game ends early after a fan is chosen for the million dollar half court shot where he makes it and inexpediently dies.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The taxi cab killer whom the CSI New York team has been trying to catch strikes again, only this time it’s at the expense of a New Jersey cop.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A bank robbery has Mac doing crime investigation from inside to help the robber prove he didn’t kill one of the hostages.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The bank robbery saga from last season continues as Mac seeks revenge after nearly being killed by the mysterious Joe.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A free street concert quickly turns into a crime scene, the victim, in this case, has been mysteriously plagued with radiation.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac is traveling to Washington to testify in court until he realizes he’s in the vicinity of a murder when a stewardess finds a dead body.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Amor sanguíneo (S6 Ep 14)
programme.desc: Cuando encuentran a una mujer joven muerta en el Central Park, el equipo de CSI de Nueva York es atraído hacia la misteriosa subcultura del vampirismo.

programme.title: CSI: New York: La fórmula (S6 Ep 15)
programme.desc: Cuando una leyenda de las carreras de autos muere en una feroz explosión, el equipo de CSI de Nueva York descubre que la causa es una alteración en el auto.

programme.title: CSI: New York: El reinando de la incertidumbre (S6 Ep16)
programme.desc: Cuando encuentran a cuatro víctimas muertas en una habitación de hotel y el principal sospechoso aparece empuñando un hacha, el equipo de CSI intenta reconstruir los detalles.

programme.title: CSI: New York: La olla de oro (S6 Ep 17)
programme.desc: Cuando encuentran a dos jóvenes periodistas muertos en la víspera del Día de San Patricio, el equipo de CSI intenta encontrar la pista al final del arco iris.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Descansa en paz, Marina Garito (S6 Ep18)
programme.desc: Cuando encuentran muerta a una mujer, la evidencia y la autopsia sugieren suicidio, pero Stella no está convencida y arriesga su vida para continuar con el caso.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Redención (S6 Ep19)
programme.desc: El último pedido de un condenado a muerte lleva a Hawkes a una cárcel de Pensilvania y se enfrenta a un secreto personal justo cuando estalla un motín en la prisión.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Sospechosos inesperados (S6 Ep20)
programme.desc: El asesinato a tiros de un chico de 14 años frente a su hermano de 12 años lleva el deseo de justicia del detective Mac Taylor a otro nivel.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Desde el subsuelo (S6 Ep21)
programme.desc: Cuando una losa de concreto comienza a chorrear sangre en el centro de la ciudad, la investigación del equipo de CSI los lleva a un mundo clandestino de peleas brutales.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Punto de vista (S6 Ep22)
programme.desc: Después de ser herido, Mac observa a sus vecinos mientras se recupera y es testigo de una actividad misteriosa que conduce a asesinato.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Escapada en vacaciones (S6 Ep23)
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI de Nueva York sigue un rastro que dejó Shane Casey y se da cuenta de que por venganza, él tiene en la mira a Danny, que está de vacaciones.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Piso 34 (S7 Ep1)
programme.desc: El miembro más nuevo del equipo de CSI de Nueva York, como bienvenida, se topa con una mujer asesinada en el edificio del laboratorio de criminalística de la policía de Nueva York.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Plática poco amigable (S7 Ep2)
programme.desc: Cuando una joven parece ser estrangulada mientras está en un chat en vivo que Adam presencia, el equipo de CSI debe determinar si fue real o una broma.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Condenado, si lo haces (S7 Ep3)
programme.desc: Cuando encuentran a una pareja golpeada en su casa, el equipo de CSI cree que tiene al sospechoso después de que una madre identifica a su hijo, pero no todo es lo que parece.

programme.desc: Cuando asesinan a un poderoso líder de una pandilla, el equipo de CSI de Nueva York debe encontrar al asesino antes de que estalle una guerra callejera.

programme.title: Presagio

programme.title: Préstame tu cuerpo
programme.desc: Leonor es una estrella de baile quien muere en un accidente en altamar. Al no poder evitar su muerte, su ángel de la guarda deberá conseguirle un cuerpo donde reencarnar.

programme.title: Pueblito
programme.desc: Una maestra persuade a un ingeniero para construir una escuela en su pueblo, pero enfrentan la corrupción del alcalde, quien, a pesar de que el ingeniero salva a su hijo, se opone; los habitantes deciden seguir adelante con su plan de construcción.

programme.title: Puerto de tentación
programme.desc: Una cabaretera ayuda a un hombre herido y ambos se enamoran, sin imaginar que juntos enfrentarían la tragedia.

programme.title: Reportaje
programme.desc: Absurdas y extravagantes aventuras resultan, cuando un hombre ofrece una gran recompensa a la periodista que sea capaz de encontrar la mejor noticia a vísperas de la celebración de Año Nuevo.

programme.title: El ojo del observador
programme.desc: Un detective privado sigue discretamente a una asesina en serie por todo Estados Unidos. La persecución toma un giro inesperado cuando él termina obsesionandose de ella.

programme.title: El rostro oscuro de la ley
programme.desc: “Del autor de Training Day”, llega este excelente drama sobre policías corruptos, ambientado en los días previos a los disturbios en la ciudad de Los Ángeles.

programme.title: Sin salida
programme.desc: Un encubrimiento y una caza de brujas ocurren después de que un político mata accidentalmente a su amante. Kevin Costner y Gene Hackman protagonizan esta tensa historia de suspenso político.

programme.title: Capote
programme.desc: Philip Seymour Hoffman nos ofrece una actuación ganadora del Oscar® (2006, Mejor Actor) como Truman Capote, el cual se embarca en un viaje para investigar el asesinato de la familia Clutter en Kansas, lo que se convertirá en su libro más reconocido.

programme.title: Knock knock: seducción fatal
programme.desc: El gesto amable de un hombre de familia (Keanu Reeves) se convierte en una peligrosa seducción y el juego mortal del gato y el ratón cuando les abre la puerta a dos desamparadas jovencitas.

programme.title: Ceguera
programme.desc: Liderados por un elenco de estrellas como Mark Ruffalo y Julianne Moore, las víctimas de una misteriosa epidemia de ceguera que se extiende por una ciudad pronto se enfrentan a una aflicción aún mayor, la caótica ruptura del orden social.

programme.title: Texas rangers: los justicieros
programme.desc: Después de la Guerra Civil, Texas queda a merced de los bandidos asesinos. Un grupo de héroes inusuales lucha contra los bandidos. Sobrepasados en cantidad y armas, juntan coraje para proteger a los inocentes y hacer lo correcto.

programme.title: Open Water (2004) (LAS)
programme.desc: A couple are left stranded in shark infested waters while on vacation.

programme.title: El señor de la guerra
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage, ganador de un Oscar®, protagoniza esta historia tensa y llena de acción sobre un famoso traficante de armas que vendió armas a dictadores y consiguió eludir la ley durante casi veinte años.

programme.title: Bernie
programme.desc: En un pequeño pueblo de Texas, un mortista afable (Jack Black, School of Rock) mantiene una amistad con una viuda rica, que pronto se convierte en controladora.

programme.title: Todo Corazón
programme.desc: Basada en el relato de Mariane Pearl sobre la terrible e inolvidable historia de su esposo, el periodista del Wall Street Journal Danny Pearl, su vida y su muerte.

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: Un negociador de la policía fracasado que se convierte en un oficial de una pequeña ciudad debe salvar a una familia secuestrada, lo que lo conduce a una situación muy peligrosa.

programme.title: El cuervo 2: Ciudad de Ángeles
programme.desc: Esta secuela veloz y llena de acción de "El cuervo" sigue el ascenso de la víctima de asesinato Ashe Corven, que regresa a la vida gracias a un misterioso cuervo. Con la ayuda de una mujer llamada Sarah, se venga de sus asesinos uno por uno.

programme.title: La batalla de Los Angeles
programme.desc: En febrero de 1942, las fuerzas estadounidenses atacaron un objeto volador no identificado sobre Los Ángeles. Ahora, casi 70 años después, los invasores extraterrestres han regresado.

programme.title: Perdita Durango
programme.desc: A psychotic couple’s crime spree grows shockingly violent as they kidnap and rape a random teenage couple and then prepare them for human sacrifice.

programme.title: El ritmo de la venganza
programme.desc: Blake Lively y Jude Law protagonizan esta película de suspenso y acción de los productores de James Bond. Tras descubrir que la muerte de su familia no fue un accidente, Stephanie (Lively) pasa de víctima a asesina, para vengarse de los responsables.

programme.title: Actos de venganza
programme.desc: Un abogado de hablar rápido (Antonio Banderas) transforma su cuerpo y toma un voto de silencio, que no se romperá hasta que descubra quién mató a su esposa e hija y tenga su venganza.

programme.title: La última pelea
programme.desc: La última pelea" narra la conmovedora e inspiracional historia de la familia Conlon, Brendan (Joel Edgerton), Tommy (Tom Hardy) y Paddy (Nick Nolte), quienes encuentran redención en la arena al luchar para arreglarse a sí mismos y a su familia.

programme.title: El monje
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat y Seann William Scott protagonizan esta gran aventura, en la que un misterioso monje tibetano, quien ha protejido un pergamino por 60 años; cree que ha encontrado a su sucesor: un joven callejero.

programme.title: Khumba
programme.desc: Rechazado por su rebaño supersticioso, una cebra a media raya se embarca en una atrevida búsqueda para ganarse sus rayas, pero encuentra el valor y la aceptación para salvar a todos los animales del gran Karoo.

programme.title: The PEBBLE AND THE PENGUIN
programme.desc: In love with Marina, the most beautiful penguin in all the land, hopeless romantic Hubie must thwart the plans of his evil rival, Drake, and win Marina’s heart in this charming, animated adventure from the creators of All Dogs Go To Heaven.

programme.title: Las aventuras de Tintín
programme.desc: De los ganadores del premio de la academia Steven Spielberg y Peter Jackson llega una historia épica: Las aventuras de Tintín, que emprende una carrera por el mundo para descubrir el misterio de un barco hundido.

programme.title: Las aventuras de Sharkboy y Lavagirl
programme.desc: De Robert Rodriguez, el director de la franquicia Mini Espías, llega una aventura de superhéroes para toda la familia. Esta es la historia de una niña con la fuerza de un volcán que se une a un niño criado por tiburones blancos.

programme.title: El monje
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat y Seann William Scott protagonizan esta gran aventura, en la que un misterioso monje tibetano, quien ha protejido un pergamino por 60 años; cree que ha encontrado a su sucesor: un joven callejero.

programme.desc: Jack Black encarna el papel más gracioso como Ignacio, un cocinero de monasterio que alimenta huérfanos de día y por las noches se transforma en Nacho Libre, un notorio luchador en calzas.

programme.desc: Cuando Anna Wyncomb conoce un club de lucha clandestino exclusivamente femenino para cambiar el caos de su vida, descubre que está mucho más conectada personalmente con la historia del club de lo que jamás podría imaginar.

programme.title: Un Guardaespaldas Escolar
programme.desc: Dos estudiantes de secundaria acosados por un matón ponen un anuncio en una revista en busca de un guardaespaldas y reciben respuesta de un veterano vagabundo.

programme.desc: Michael J. "Cocodrilo" Dundee es un australiano de espíritu libre que caza cocodrilos con las manos, les clava la mirada a búfalos de agua y bebe hasta desmadrarse.

programme.title: "Cocodrilo" Dundee II

programme.title: Cocodrilo Dundee en Los Ángeles

programme.title: The Maury Show: I'll Prove You Are Cheating on My Teen!

programme.title: The Maury Show: Is My Man Sleeping With My Teen Nephew?
programme.desc: Nikki won’t marry Will until he proves he’s faithful, but what did our hidden cameras confirm? Then, teens Jessica and Sean are days away from marriage. Could Sean be cheating with her best friend?

programme.desc: Tony cheated on his wife Tiff and impregnated another woman. Now he’s denying both of their kids! Plus, more shocking tales of mad moms, denying dads and DNA drama!

programme.desc: Enri flies her hostages to her brother in the village of the Granites, home to a faction of the Lost Millenium; there Clain learns there's more than meets the eye inside the Fractale system.

programme.title: Fractale

programme.title: Fractale
programme.desc: A glitch in the Granites' getaway ship has them stumped, but Clain uses his hacking skills to reveal a mischievous "doppel" that can't resist a game of hide and seek.

programme.title: Fractale
programme.desc: The Granites' land their ship out of range of the Fractale system to make repairs; Clain and Phryne take in an eye-opening view of the effects of Fractale's failing structures after they meet a lone antique collector.

programme.title: Fractale
programme.desc: After they crash their ship, Clain and an ill Nessa find themselves in the extravagant city of Xanadu under the care of deceptively friendly "doppels."

programme.title: Fractale

programme.desc: Byakko appears to be defeated until Yusuke's team enters the Beast's secret lair.

programme.title: Black Clover
programme.desc: The Black Bulls make a harrowing journey to the Underwater Temple and meet its people.

programme.title: Black Clover
programme.desc: The temple mages attempt to divide and conquer when Gifso magically separates the Black Bulls into different parts of the Underwater Temple to fight one-on-one battles.

programme.title: Deca-Dence
programme.desc: Kaburagi uses his hard-won prize to return to Deca-dence, but without his old account he's an outsider in his own life; Natsume and Kaburagi come to a realization about their futures.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Voto de silencio
programme.desc: Una mirada al caso contra Jack Reeves. Unos amigos informaron que su novia por correo había desaparecido. La policía centró sus sospechas en Reeves y, mientras buscaba pistas, descubrió información que lo vinculaba con la muerte de dos ex esposas.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1988, cuando un paciente muere inesperadamente en el consultorio del neurólogo de California, Richard Boggs, la policía comienza lo que creen que será una investigación de rutina.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Asesino cereal
programme.desc: Cuando un incendio destruyó la mayor parte de una casa y un niño desapareció, la policía organizó la búsqueda más grande en la historia de su pequeña ciudad.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Pedido fatal
programme.desc: Un hombre es encontrado muerto en su casa y su ex esposa tiene una coartada perfecta. Para determinar la hora de la muerte, los investigadores deben saber cuándo comió la víctima por última vez.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: A Prueba de Fuego
programme.desc: Un pirómano en serie inicia varios incendios que causan daños por un valor de millones de dólares y la muerte de tres personas. Él es descubierto, en parte, mediante el uso de hipnosis forense.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: A cenar y ver una película
programme.desc: La hora de la muerte se vuelve fundamental después de que se encuentra asesinada a una mujer embarazada en su habitación con aire acondicionado.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1988, se descubrió el cuerpo de una mujer joven en un río de Ohio. La mayor parte de la evidencia había sido borrada, pero el hijo de 6 años de la víctima, sin saberlo, les dijo a los investigadores todo lo que necesitaban saber.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un misterioso accidente informático llevó a una próspera empresa de fabricación al borde del colapso, poniendo en peligro cientos de puestos de trabajo.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1981, la oficial de la correccional de New York, Donna Payant, desapareció y luego fue encontrada en un vertedero. El médico forense no solo identificó la causa de la muerte, sino que también encontró una pista importante.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Una mujer de 19 años fue encontrada muerta en su automóvil; la escena se había organizado para que el asesinato pareciera un suicidio.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Cuatro caminos
programme.desc: Una mujer nativa americana fue brutalmente asesinada en el desierto de Nuevo México y la escena del crimen estaba llena de evidencia forense.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando una estudiante universitaria desaparece, sus compañeros de clase estaban preocupados por la seguridad de ella y la de ellos.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1971, John List dejó una nota con los cuerpos de su madre, esposa y tres hijos en el salón de baile de su mansión antes de desaparecer por completo. Los detectives deben resolver el caso, a pesar de tener solo una fotografía desactualizada de List.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: El infiel
programme.desc: Walter Notheis, Jr. era mejor conocido al público Americano como el entretenedor, Walter Scott, vocalista principal de la banda, Bob Kuban and the In-Men. Walter no sabía que la canción sería una premonición de los eventos que llevarían a su muerte.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1996, cuando un grupo fundamentalista comienza a robar bancos cerca de Spokane, las autoridades saben de inmediato que están tratando con criminales con experiencia.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En el estreno de la serie Archivos Forenses (Forensic Files), la serie de crímenes reales más extensa de la historia, una asistente de vuelo de Connecticut desaparece. La policía sospecha que su esposo es culpable de asesinato, pero ¿pueden comprobarlo?

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Una estudiante de último año de la universidad fue violada y asesinada cerca de un sendero sin pavimentar utilizado por los estudiantes para caminar de un lado del campus al otro.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Plato frío
programme.desc: Un hombre murió en su casa después de una larga historia de enfermedad cardíaca. Se asumió que esta fue la causa de su muerte.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: La víctima había sido agredida sexualmente y apuñalada hasta la muerte en la playa. Se descubrió un par de zapatos de tenis de hombre cerca de su cuerpo.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Se encuentra a Nancy Newman y a sus dos hijas que fueron brutalmente asesinadas. La escena del crimen no tiene escasez de pruebas, pero los investigadores no pueden encontrar un vínculo concluyente con su principal sospechoso.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 2005, David Castor sufrió una muerte lenta y agonizante durante varios días. Su esposa Stacey sostuvo que fue un suicidio, a pesar de que se hizo con un anticongelante.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: El conductor dijo que no podía haber sido él quien atropelló a un peatón y se fugó en la calle Harrisburg. El Jeep Grand Cherokee que él estaba arrendando en ese entonces había sido vendido meses atrás a otro comprador en otro estado.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1996, la policía de Virginia Beach llegó al departamento de Makdessi para encontrar los cuerpos ensangrentados de Elise Makdessi y de Quincy Brown, un soldado de la Marina. ¿Pero era el amante de Elise o su agresor?

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Mientras estaba de vacaciones en California, Earl Morris se entera de que su esposa ha desaparecido de su casa en Arizona. La búsqueda de Ruby Morris involucra a decenas de investigadores y científicos – incluyendo también a la Guardia Costera.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Una pastilla amarga para tragar
programme.desc: Se cuenta la historia de la bombero Michelle Baker. Después de conocer al Dr. Maynard Muntzing, quedó embarazada de él. Después de esta noticia, ella se enfermaba siempre que estaban juntos.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: El mal pie

programme.desc: Clare tries to impress Asher by pitching a story about Romeo and Jules. K.C. and Bianca play matchmaker for K.C.'s mom. Katie chaperones Maya's date with Cam.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: A secret is eating away at Clare, but will facing the truth make things worse for her? K.C.'s mom has some surprising news. Meanwhile, Maya tries to impress Cam.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Cam needs a break from hockey, so he blows off practice to hang out with Maya. K.C.'s dad is release from jail, but is he ready to have him back in the picture? Fiona's loft is a disaster, and she blames her new roommate -- Drew.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Cam struggles to live up to everyone's expectations on the ice. K.C. wants his dad out of his life -- even if it means doing something drastic. Drew and Fiona try to work out their differences.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Imogen designs an elaborate set for Romeo and Jules, and reaches out to her estranged mother for the money to build it. Meanwhile, Becky interferes with ticket sales.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Imogen worries about her dad's strange behavior. Becky bonds with Adam without realizing that he's transgender. Katie and Jake realize they have feelings for each other -- but where does that leave Mike Dallas?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Clare writes an article that stirs up trouble at school and makes her a new enemy -- Mike Dallas. Tori, Tristan, and Dave compete in a talent contest. Drew feels distant from Bianca, so he goes on a spending spree.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Eli organizes a surprise birthday party to cheer Clare up, and starts to suspect that she's hiding something. Audra urges Drew to go back to Degrassi. Dave worries that he and Alli are growing apart.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When a group of parents try to stop the play, Eli takes action. As opening night approaches, Tristan realizes that if he doesn't find a boyfriend fast, his first kiss will be onstage -- with Dave. Meanwhile, Becky wants to "save" Adam.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: On opening night for Romeo and Jules, Tristan is nowhere to be found. Is it stage fright -- or something worse? While Eli is busy with the play, Clare decides to get even with Asher.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: As Becky begins to fall for Adam, she worries how her conservative parents will react.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Becky doesn't want to keep Adam a secret, so she decides to tell her parents that he's transgender.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Maya is not feeling very good about herself, so she lets Tori give her a pageant-style makeover.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Maya's friendship with Tori is tested when both girls compete in the Miss Millennial pageant.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Frustrated with her heavy workload, Alli decides to have a little fun -- with or without Dave.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After several days without sleep, Alli crashes at the worst possible time.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: At the Battle of the Bands, Adam really hits it off with Missy, another musician.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: As WhisperHug prepares for the band competition, things get messy between Adam and Missy.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Drew can’t wait to tie the knot with Bianca in Vegas. But the closer they get, the more he second guesses their decision. When Bianca discovers Drew’s wavering, she freaks!

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Drew can’t wait to tie the knot with Bianca in Vegas. But the closer they get, the more he second guesses their decision. When Bianca discovers Drew’s wavering, she freaks!

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: During Spirit Week at Degrassi, everyone has something to prove. Cam feels threatened by Zig, Dallas makes a flirty bet with Alli, and Eli's relationship with Clare is tested.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When tragedy strikes at Degrassi, everyone deals with the situation in a different way. As the students struggle to cope, Simpson cancels Spirit Week.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Haunted by Degrassi's recent tragedy, Eli invites Jake and Mo to a secret party. Meanwhile, Marisol tries to reunite Jake and Katie, and Jenna forms an unexpected bond with Connor.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Worried about Eli's mental state, Clare becomes overprotective. Katie wants Jake back, but is it too late? Jenna must choose between two guys.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After Drew moves out, there's a break-in at the loft, and Fiona fears for her safety. Someone from Dallas' past pays him a surprise visit. A tough assignment forces Zig to think about the mistakes he's made.

programme.title: Ice Age Giants
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts journeys 40,000 years back in time on the trail of the great beasts of the ice age. This was the last time that giants like mammoths, woolly rhinos and sabre-toothed cats ruled our planet.

programme.title: Wildlife on One
programme.desc: A look at extraordinary animals around the world, emphasising their unpredictable behaviour.

programme.title: Wildlife on One
programme.desc: Fossil remains serve as clues in discovering how prehistoric flying creatures lived.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: In a time when monstrous creatures ruled the earth, South America was the land of the giants. Nigel Marven walks among these gigantic creatures, on a quest to witness the largest predator bringing down the largest prey.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Nigel Marven journeys back to the sand dunes of Mesozoic Mongolia to track the owner of the largest claws of all time, the Therizinosaurus. His adventure yields a series of surprising clues, a nest, footprints, dung, and more.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Scientists study the perfectly preserved remains of an adolescent allosaurus they call Big Al.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: This scientific detective story traces the evidence for Big Al the allosaur's existence, using clues from climate change studies, forensics, and fossil records to bring him back to life.

programme.title: Attenborough and the Giant Dinosaur
programme.desc: David Attenborough tells the story of the discovery and reconstruction in Argentina of the world's largest known dinosaur, a brand new species of titanosaur. Measuring 37m long, it now holds the record as the biggest animal ever to walk the earth.

programme.title: The Making Of: Walking With Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Animatronics, computer animation and science re-create the dinosaurs' world.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs: Shortbites
programme.desc: Featured species are the coelophysis and the diplodocus.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs: Shortbites
programme.desc: Featured species are the opthalmosaurus and the ornithocheirus.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs: Shortbites
programme.desc: Featured species are the leaellynasaura and the tyrannosaurus.

programme.title: The X-Creatures
programme.desc: Chris Packham is out to determine whether the Himalayan Yeti and the Sumatran Orang Pendek exist.

programme.title: The X-Creatures
programme.desc: Chris Packham embarks on a mission to investigate the existence of the mythical giant squid.

programme.title: The X-Creatures
programme.desc: Chris Packham searches for clues related to the existence of the Loch Ness Monster in Scotland. He also visits Australia to learn about a giant lizard called Megalania.

programme.title: The X-Creatures
programme.desc: Chris Packham sets out in search of stories about Bigfoot, a mythical ape-like creature that has been the focus of many fiction novels, movies and documentaries over the years.

programme.title: The X-Creatures
programme.desc: Chris Packham explores the English countryside to learn about mythical big cats such as the Beast of Bodmin and Beast of Exmoor.

programme.title: The X-Creatures
programme.desc: Chris Packham investigates whether the thylacine, aka Tasmanian tiger or Tasmanian wolf, have truly gone extinct. The species lived in Australia and Tasmania.

programme.title: Monsters We Met
programme.desc: America was once home to such fierce predators as the giant short-faced bear and the saber-toothed tiger.

programme.title: Monsters We Met

programme.title: Monsters We Met

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A human psychologist calls Cesar for help when her pet pug and pet pig fight; an emotionally scarred German shepherd.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A dog with a dark side has a knack for stalking and killing small animals; a poodle chases cars; a bulldog has an adverse reaction to skateboarders.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A rescued dog is too ferocious; an insane Great Dane upsets a household; playing matchmaker for a lonely but picky boxer.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Pets abandoned during Hurricane Katrina reunite with their owners or find new homes; a pit bull behaves aggressively toward the dog of his owner's new girlfriend; a large dog has pica.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Rottweilers with behavior problems; a small mixed-breed fails two obedience classes; a vizsla needs help adjusting to a move from the country to the city.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Doberman mix instigates fights at the dog park; a Pomeranian charges other dogs; an aggressive terrier mix.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Actress Denise Richards needs help getting in control of her three dogs; a miniature pinscher bites visitors; a lazy basset hound.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A woman's aggressive dogs are coming in between her and her husband; a German shepard who failed obedience school; a Sheltie barks in the car and bites other dogs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: British problem dogs including wild German Shepherds, a dog that must be muzzled by court order, and an English cocker spaniel that hates cars.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Problem dogs in the U.K. including two dogs that spent most of their lives in Africa, and a barking Jack Russell terrier mix.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar's English adventure ends with an aggressive klee kai, a collie mix that hates walks, and a hyper Labrador.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar brings discipline to four chaotic Chinese crested dogs, an over-energetic mastiff mix and two unruly miniature dachshunds.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps the lead singer of Rooney with his aggressive pit bull, while writer and producer Paul needs help with his two Boston terriers.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Playboy Playmates, Miss February 2010 is having trouble with her Chichuahua, while Orange County, Miss September 2011 with her terrier pug mix.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are finally getting married! They've been together for more than ten years, but Dog is determined, as he puts it, to "marry his common law wife the Christian way."

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog, Beth are off to the Big Island for their wedding. They hope to relax for a few days but it turns out Leland has a fugitive he needs to catch and despite the time limit, neither Dog nor Beth can resist the opportunity to catch a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the team must deal with misleading informants, belligerent boaters, and angry drunks when they go after Kimberly, a traffic offender with over 20 violations. And if that isn't enough, Dog has another problem -- Duane Lee is sick.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When the team hunts for Steven, a fugitive with a history of domestic abuse, they seek help from his girlfriend, who's been a victim of his abuse. Meanwhile, Beth trains for a 5K race to help raise awareness about domestic abuse.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is going to be the keynote speaker at the annual Profession Bail Agents convention in Las Vegas, but before he leaves he's got to clear two cases from his docket--Heidi and Stephanie.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Tim's got a big problem. Owen has failed to appear in court. He's on bond for serious drug charges and now Tim could lose $30,000 if he doesn't catch Owen. With Dog's help he tries to track down the co-signer but they come up dry.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: It's been raining for days and the team is going a little stir-crazy, but Dog has the cure; a good hunt. Maui has failed to appear on a drug charge and the team has just one lead. She was recently spotted during a bust at a local chop shop garage.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog decides it's time to outfit the Da Kine crew with new SUVs. After a quick visit to their local dealership, they go after Jasmine, a woman whose criminal record includes over 37 arrests for everything from drug promotion to assault.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog has two fugitives to catch, and he gets help from the unlikeliest sources--the fugitives' mothers. First, Ginger's mother wants to revoke her daughter's bond. Then Brandon's mother decides to revoke his bond because Brandon has an ice habit.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is back hunting in the big city of Denver, but chasing fugitives on the mainland is more dangerous than ever. So Dog decides that the crew should get pepper-ball guns, which have much better range than pepper spray.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog decides to help two of his bondsmen buddies, Dave "Red" Widhelm and "Downtown" Bobby Brown. First up is Red, who has a client, named Alvin, whose bond is $20,000. Then the team goes after Craig, a client of Bobby's whose bond is almost $70,000.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog leads the team on another adrenaline-filled chase in Denver. The fugitive, Robert, has a habit of address-hopping that makes him a difficult target, but Dog refuses to give up and finally tracks Robert down in his latest hideaway.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: The team is still in Colorado, and today Dog starts his day by to giving his kids and crew a sample of their western heritage by taking them horseback riding. This hunt takes Dog back to his old stomping grounds in Denver.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's time is running out in Colorado. After a month of helping his bail bondsmen friends around Denver, he's got to get his family back home to Hawaii. But Dog wants one more capture before they leave.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog kick-starts the search for Jackson, a 240lbs, six feet tall bad boy who has skipped out on a $10,000 bond. Jackson’s apparently at his father-in-law's house, but the father-in-law has info about Jackson that brings Dog to a unique hideout.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: With twelve kids of his own, Dog knows how hard it is to keep children on the straight and narrow, especially during their turbulent teens.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: A one-hour special that looks back at 2006, one of Dog's most tumultuous years, which has included the passing of Beth's father, Dog and Beth's wedding, the tragic death of Dog's daughter Barbara.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When Lyssa points out that the fugitive in the next case has the same birth date as Barbara, Dog's recently deceased daughter, the team takes a special vow to capture the young woman.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog finds himself fighting two enemies; the law and his inner demons. He continues his legal battle to fight extradition to Mexico in connection with his 2003 capture of fugitive rapist Andrew Luster. His other struggle is private.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog shows his love of justice and children in this poignant episode. He begins by giving encouragement to a group of handicapped children, then starting the search for Jacob, a fugitive who's abandoned his wife and children.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Michael is out on bail for drug sales, theft, and violation of parole. Dog's after him for failing to appear in court and his only lead is Jen, his co-signer and girlfriend.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the boys are going after a fugitive with a $25,000 bond and a string of theft charges behind him. When the team hits his apartment, they find a boot print on the door, a souvenir of a police raid from only days earlier?

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake travels to Hong Kong to patch up the China Seas oil deal and learns Ahmed has left the country; Mark blackmails Alexis for $100,000, and McVane watches as he deposits the check; Kirby attempts to kill Alexis but is unsuccessful.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Alexis thwarts Blake's loan extension; Sammy Jo arrives in Denver to see her son; after quarreling with Alexis, Mark is found dead after a fall from her balcony.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake mortgages the mansion to raise money; Tracy tells Alexis of her affair with Dex; Alexis is questioned about Mark's death; Sammy Jo intends to obtain custody of her son; an unknown woman, full of curiosity about Alexis, checks into La Mirage.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Kirby's attempt to kill Alexis is unsuccessful, and Alexis promises to remain silent if Kirby will leave Adam; Sammy Jo reveals the culprit behind Claudia's mystery calls; Fallon is gripped with a seizure and drives off as her wedding is about to begin.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Following a serious traffic accident, Fallon mysteriously vanishes. Dex and Steven bail Alexis out of jail. Sammy Jo attempts to seduce Adam. Alexis flatters Adam by suggesting he work with her defense attorney, Warren Ballard.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Steven accuses Adam of conspiring with Sammy Jo to kidnap Danny. Blake arranges to take out a mortgage on the mansion. He little suspects Alexis has signed the note and will become the owner if he defaults.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: To secure financing for his bankrupt company, Blake arranges to see Billy Waite, a notoriously underhanded oil man. Jeff continues his search for Fallon. Impatient with the progress her lawyer is making on her defense, Alexis fires Warren Ballard.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: In Seattle, Jeff and Blake learn the woman who died in the plane crash with Peter DeVilbis cannot be positively identified, but the ring she was wearing is indeed Fallon's wedding band. Back in Denver, Fallon's moving funeral is held.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake visits Dominique at La Mirage to discuss her recent revelation. She tells Blake that her mother was a long-time mistress of his father and has evidence to prove it. At Alexis' trial, a neighbor offers powerful evidence that incriminates Alexis.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: On the witness stand, Steven testified he saw Alexis push Mark to his death. Jeff sees other women in an attempt to forget Fallon but remains obsessed with his ex-wife. Alexis takes the stand and testifies.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Adam and Dex vow to prove Alexis' innocence and begin a determined campaign. The woman who testified she had seen Alexis on the terrace with Mark had hosted a party that evening and snapped photographs.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Amanda insists Alexis acknowledge their relationship and begs her to reveal her father's identity. Alexis tells her it was simply an anonymous ski instructor in Gstaad. Steven and Alexis reconcile.

programme.title: Dynasty

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A suspicious fire sweeps through an apartment, killing two young women. The cause of the fire and the identity of the victims are unclear, but a closer look at the scene reveals something hidden in the ashes.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Soon after becoming pregnant by Dr. Maynard Muntzing, firefighter Michelle Baker's health quickly deteriorates. Eventually, she raises suspicions that Muntzing is doing her harm.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When Leann Fletcher is found dead, investigators use blood spatter analysis and forensic computing to find a motive for her murder: her husband, a prominent lawyer, was having an affair with judge Susan Chrzanowski.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A healthy young man dies mysteriously in his sleep and toxicology tests reveal a lethal dose of lidocaine in his blood. Investigators find a suicide note and presume he killed himself until a forensic linguist examines the note.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a woman disappeared without a trace, there were two possible explanations: kidnapping or murder. Careful investigation, a forensic artist and DNA profiling enabled police to find a single suspect, who was known to prey upon vulnerable women.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: This examination of the role autopsies play in murder investigations focuses on the suspicious death of Virginia Ridley. Police charge her mentally unstable husband with murder, but a medical examiner discovers that she died of natural causes.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2006, Darlene VanderGiesen received threatening emails and then disappeared. Tracking the source of the emails led police to the home of Daphne Wright, where they believe a murder was committed.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1993, the state of Florida was known for more than just Disney World. Worldwide attention focused on a rash of robberies which targeted tourists. Some vacationers were killed in these attacks, but some fought and survived.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: This episode documents a deadly bombing at a church in Oakwood, Illinois, in December 1997.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2008, college co-ed Jenna Verhaalen was found dead in her Bryan, Texas apartment. Petechial hemorrhages in her eyes indicated that she was strangled.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: On September 17, 1984, in a suburb of Tucson, Arizona, eight-year-old Vicki Hoskins left home on her pink bicycle to mail a letter for her mother. She never returned, but her slightly damaged bicycle was found nearby.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a little girl got sick and died, investigators were stumped. Was it an accident, an unexplained illness or murder?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When Rosemary Anderson is found dead on the side of the road, her boyfriend becomes the prime suspect. He eventually confessed to her murder, but so did another man: serial killer Eric Edgar Cooke.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A security guard disappeared from his post without a trace; his remains were found a year later in a remote campsite.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: For years, a woman suffered from what appeared to be the unpleasant side effects of lithium, a drug prescribed to treat bipolar disorder. When she died, investigators had to determine if her death was due to natural causes, suicide or murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: For seven years, a trio of men robbed one bank after another. They always got away before the police arrived and they left no evidence behind. But the way they stood and the clothes they wore told a story that could be read by forensic scientists.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1991, Maine resident Pearl Smith goes missing after an argument with her husband, Bill Bruns. When investigators find a blood trail that leads to the couple's basement, police are sure they'll find the victim's body.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1981, New York correctional officer Donna Payant disappeared and was later found in a landfill. The medical examiner not only identified the cause of death, but also found an important clue.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Investigators find a shoe print, several foreign hairs and unknown fingerprints at a murder scene. But they believe the most telling piece of evidence is the bite mark on the victim's chest.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1993, the Amtrak Railroad experienced the deadliest train crash in United States history when the Sunset Limited derailed while crossing Alabama's Big Bayou Canot bridge. 47 passengers and crew were killed; scores more were injured.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: It was one of the most unusual cases in forensic history. Investigators had to find a way to solve a murder case using only a squashed tomato found at the crime scene and tiny, pinpoint reflections of light in a photograph.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2000, the body of exotic dancer Rachel Siani was found beneath a New Jersey bridge. Investigators wondered if she had committed suicide. They discovered that Rachel offered to assist a drunk customer named John "Jack" Denofa to his motel room.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The victim was well liked and successful, which made the brutality of the crime even harder to understand.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When the decomposed body of a teenage girl is discovered, police have no clues to her identity. To solve the case, investigators turn to bug larvae found on the body and a tiny wad of chewing gum found near the victim's body.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Paul Gruber's daughter suspected something was wrong when she received birthday cards addressed from her father, but written in a stranger's handwriting.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A killer tries to incinerate everything that could link him to his crime. But in doing so, he inadvertently creates new forensic evidence. Detectives employ a technique never before used in a criminal investigation to bring it to light.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman disappears and her husband becomes the prime suspect — especially after police find a huge bloodstain on the carpet of their bedroom. When they spray the bedroom with Luminol, they discover it was awash with blood spatter.
