programme.desc: Lloyd moves in and tries to make nice by helping out with chores, but he just gets in the way. Pythor has awoken the Vipoids and the Constrictaurs and an all out snake war has taken over Ninjago.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Pythor declares himself to be the destined leader who will reawaken The Great Devourer – an ancient beast who can’t be killed and will consume all of Ninjago. We find out Nya is the Samurai and Lloyd is taken prisoner by the snake tribes.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: When the four ninja follow the mysterious falcon into the woods, they stumble on a hidden work shop where Zane learns the secret about his past and in the process, finally knowing who he is, he is the first ninja to unlock his true potential.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Jay and Nya have to cut their first date in Mega-Monster Amusement Park short as the Serpentine are on their way to retrieve the first or four fang blades to be used to awaken the Great Devourer.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: The four ninja go undercover as a dance troupe and enter a talent contest in their quest to win “The Blade Cup” where one of the fang blades is hidden.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: The ninjas are suspicious when their arch enemy Lord Garmadon moves in to help searching for his missing son Lloyd

programme.title: LEGO Chima
programme.desc: Cragger has been freed and wants to give out CHI to all tribes of Chima, but he has none. He employs a strange Raven alchemist to produce some fake CHI. But the fake CHI has some very unexpected side effects, and the alchemist has an agenda of his own.

programme.title: LEGO Chima
programme.desc: Chima is peaceful yet again. Laval and Cragger go on a joyful Speedor cruise. But the Ravens use the peace to move into Eagle Spires. The Eagles try to get rid of them, but the Ravens are very persistent. It will be up to Eris to trick them to leave.

programme.title: LEGO Chima
programme.desc: Laval and Cragger attempt to get all the tribes to agree on a lasting peace in Chima, but Crooler creates a strange fog that makes everyone very powerful and angry, especially Cragger.

programme.title: LEGO Dreamzzz
programme.desc: The Dream Chasers arrive at Castle Nocturnia hoping to find the key to defeating the Nightmare King, but the castle won't reveal its secrets easily.

programme.title: LEGO Dreamzzz
programme.desc: The Dream Chasers rush to crack the code to reveal Lunia's secrets while the Nightmare King presses a full-scale assault on Castle Nocturnia.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego y Peluzin empiezan un Boy Band, Gaspar se ve forzado a integrarse por problemas económicos. El Abuelo intenta comenzar una relación amorosa.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego tiene problemas con el alcohol, y destruye el departamento. Peluzin descubre que va a heredar una gran cantidad de dinero y el Abuelo lo ayuda.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego, traumado por asistir a una corrida de toros, cambia su estilo de vida. Jonathan se entera de una noticia que cambiara su vida.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar pierde su trabajo y se desconecta del mundo mientras que el Abuelo y el Noruego empiezan un negocio.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo y el Noruego suben de peso y Jonathan tiene problemas con un bully en la escuela.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Una persona del pasado del Abuelo reaparece en su vida. El Noruego tiene problemas dentales.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar invita a la familia a un viaje muy especial para él. Peluzin se pega al plan.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego tiene un sueño de convertirse en policía. El Abuelo sufre un accidente en la regadera

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo entra en el mundo de la actuación y Peluzín es arrestado.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo se de cuenta que el y el Noruego pueden ser padre e hijo. Pitipú es atropellado.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo, con la ayuda de Gaspar, hace una lista de todas las cosas que quiere hacer antes de morir. Peluzin y el Noruego están adictos a un videojuego.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: En este episodio La familia del barrio muestra una divertida parodia a las Sitcoms mas populares, desde la óptica del prototipo de familia mexicana disfuncional.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Salubridad clausura el Tenta-Culo e Irma consigue trabajo como empleada domestica en el departamento de los Del Barrio.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo necesita un trasplante de riñón y ninguno de los Del Barrio es compatible para donarle uno. Sin embargo, Peluzín tiene la solución en sus manos.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego se lanza como candidato a Presidente del Condominio. Sin embargo, un oponente inesperado eclipsa sus planes en plena campaña.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Las noticias anuncian que un meteorito chocará contra la tierra, acabando con todos los seres vivientes. Los Del Barrio se preparan para el Apocalipsis.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: En una borrachera, el Abuelo y el Noruego atropellan con su coche a Santa Claus justo antes de la Navidad. Para no dejar a los niños sin regalos, el Abuelo toma el lugar del accidentado.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Don Sebas se casa en una isla tropical y todos viajan a la boda. Sin embargo, los descuidos del Abuelo hacen que casi se pierda el evento.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Los del Barrio llegan a su edificio y se dan cuenta que está rodeado por un gran muro que les impide la entrada.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar les restringe el dinero al Abuelo y al Noruego ocasionando que el Noruego tenga que consumir un licor hecho en casa por Peluzín lo que lo deja ciego.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego lleva a Jonathan al museo de antropología por encargo de su escuela y se da cuenta que un personaje del Calendario Azteca se parece mucho a él.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: La Familia del Barrio se va de vacaciones a Acapulco, invitados por Gaspar. Después de una gran borrachera en el Baby'O, el abuelo amanece en la casa de Acapulco Shore.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Accidentalmente, el Abuelo descubre las habilidades boxísticas de Peluzín y se dedica a explotarlas. Mientras, el Noruego se embarca en la búsqueda de un nuevo hobbie.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Camino a rentar una película, el Noruego adquiere una nueva mascota. En tanto, Peluzín tiene que mudarse de su departamento por falta de pago.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego se topa con un niño de la calle con quien supuestamente mantiene un parentesco mientras que Peluzín organiza un negocio piramidal para aprovecharse de todos los del edificio

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Un incidente hace que Irma revalore su vida y desaparezca. Mientras el Abuelo y el Noruego tratan de encontrarla, Gaspar y Jonathan tratan de encontrarle su lugar a Olaf en la familia.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Independientemente de resultado de las elecciones norteamericanas, Donald Trump decide declarale la guerra a México y LFDB se embarca en una misión especial para derrocar al tirano Trump.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: When a well-known law professor is killed while being chased by a tabloid journalist, the victim's husband tries to keep family secrets out of the press.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Opponents of Adam Schiff question the handling of a sexual-assault case by the police and the D.A.'s office.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The investigation into a girl's death reveals secrets the adoptive family was desperately trying to hide.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives discover a shocking twist involving unlikely suspects when they investigate the brutal beating of a black man dumped near the highway.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A robbery/assault victim feeds the police half-truths leading to the discovery of the cold-blooded murder of a young girl.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The death of a boy from an injection of a lethal flu sends detectives Briscoe and Curtis and prosecutors McCoy and Carmichael after the murderer.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A serial killer confesses to new crimes, and McCoy and Carmichael face a moral dilemma when they learn they have the wrong man.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The death of a female embryologist at a fertility clinic leads Briscoe and Curtis on a search for a desperate killer.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The shooting death of a young escort prompts an investigation into high society in New York, while McCoy and Carmichael track down career criminals.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The murder of a corrections officer leads detectives to a women's prison where a guard was linked to an inmate Carmichael put away on drug charges.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives feel a woman is withholding information when they probe the murder of her wealthy husband and very young daughter.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Evidence points Detectives Briscoe and Curtis in the direction of a fascist youth gathering after the brutal beating and murder of a high-school girl.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A shooting sends police divers into the Hudson River where they find a VW bus linked to a murder case closed in the 1960s during student uprisings.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Discovery of a parolee's corpse in a car trunk sends detectives after a suspect that bounty hunters also want, dead or alive.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Curtis probe the murder of a popular Harlem community leader; McCoy and Carmichael struggle to prevent a chaotic situation.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Discovery of a corpse in Battery Park reunites squads when the victim turns out to be a Baltimore official. (Concluding on "Homicide: Life on the Street.")

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: ¡Explora la seguridad con Little Angel! Desde el patio de recreo hasta la los primeros auxilios, pasando por la hora de la siesta y el cuidado de la piel. Será un viaje lleno de diversión para mantenerte a salvo.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a los Little Angels en un viaje lleno de diversión en el que aprenderás a compartir, lo que potenciará la empatía y el sentimiento de cuidado hacia los demás.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a Little Angel en el divertido viaje de aprender las lecciones más importantes de la vida.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: ¡Sumérgete en la diversión veraniega con Little Angel! Desde compartir en el parque hasta emocionantes visitas al parque acuático, nadar, bailar, acampar, días de playa y aventuras junto al lago, ¡es un verano lleno de alegría y risas!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Entra en un mundo de encanto y diversión eternos con Little Angel y las mejores canciones infantiles.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Bienvenido al mundo de los pequeños modales, donde los Little Angels enseñarán valiosas lecciones de amabilidad, empatía y buenos modales.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: ¡Únete a la aventura de aprendizaje de Little Angel! Desde explorar profesiones hasta comprender los sentidos, la alimentación sana, la anatomía y las visitas al médico, ¡cada paso es un descubrimiento de conocimiento y diversión!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a los Little Angels y disfruta de grandes risas, lecciones y momentos conmovedores mientras crecen.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Acompaña a Little Angel en sus divertidas aventuras. Desde paseos en camión hasta misterios con calcetines, zapatos apestosos, magia con helados, rugidos de dinosaurios, la hora de dormir y los superpoderes de mamá: ¡un día de diversión e imaginación!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Acompaña a Little Angel en una emocionante aventura de aprendizaje y exploración. Desde descubrir sabores hasta dominar movimientos de karate, cada aventura está llena de risas, descubrimientos y valiosas lecciones que inspiran la curiosidad.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Acompaña a los Little Angels en un viaje especial a través de un día lleno de exploración y aprendizaje. Desde ordenar la casa hasta recordar su infancia, cada momento trae nuevos descubrimientos.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Acompaña a los Little Angels y aprende sobre sus amigos los animales en esta emocionante aventura que seguro les arrancará muchas sonrisas a los más pequeños.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Súbete a bordo de un viaje lleno de diversión y risas mientras Little Angel se adentra en una aventura.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Acompaña a Little Angel en sus aventuras de juego. Desde la imitación hasta los sustos a la hora de dormir, lavarse las manos, la paciencia, la búsqueda de juguetes, las ovejas sucias y el alegre cucú, ¡es un día de risas y juegos!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a los Little Angels en sus aventuras llenas de risas y lecciones de vida. Aprenden a tomar decisiones saludables y la alegría de ayudar.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Prepárate para acompañar a los Little Angels en un viaje de coraje y valentía, en el que aprenderán a enfrentarse a nuevos retos con una sonrisa y con confianza.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a Little Angel en las encantadoras melodías que inspiran dulces sueños y sonrisas.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: ¡Únete a Little Angel para un día de diversión! Desde cantar con globos hasta imitar sonidos de animales, canciones infantiles, partes del cuerpo, citas con el abuelo, sueños de dinosaurios y confiar en el médico, ¡es un día de risas y aprendizaje!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: ¡Acompaña a los Little Angels en un día lleno de aventuras! Desde armar un puesto de limonadas hasta convertirse en princesas, explorar con la araña Itsy Bitsy y disfrutar de fiestas en pijama, ¡cada momento es mágico!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Acompaña a los Little Angels en un día lleno de diversión, aprendizaje y emoción. Desde la rutina matutina hasta el recreo en la escuela, pasando por el cuidado de los hermanitos y canciones deportivas.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Ingalls try to help a boy who is rejected by the townsfolk because his father is an Indian warrior.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie

programme.desc: Tuja has invited Nefertine, Piramses, Tanfenaton, and other children to the palace, so they could watch a performer do a show with a small monkey named Baba.

programme.title: The Cat In The Hat Knows A Lot About...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko has stolen something from a man named Pycal, and he wants it back. Pycal is a magician who is able to shoot flames from his hands, walk on air, and deflect bullets with ease. Lupin goes up against Pycal in hopes of saving Fujiko.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A boat collision ruins Lupin and Fujiko's quiet boating expedition. They discover a woman named Linda in the other boat just as gunmen on a larger boat attack them.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko successfully pull off a heist; that is until Zenigata manages to shoot Lupin with a tranquilizer dart. Zenigata hauls Lupin off to jail. Despite Fujiko's best efforts, she cannot break Lupin out of prison.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: With the help of some quick gunplay by his partner Jigen, Lupin takes on the world in elaborate heists, classic car chases, and nasty explosions. Fujiko, a buxom redhead with a penchant for betrayal, always gets tangled up in Lupin's capers.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: One rainy afternoon, a man seeks Lupin's help on behalf of a young woman. The woman is actually Fujiko, who is after a diamond known as "The Star of Killamanjaro". The diamond was implanted into the chest of a mob boss.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Three scrolls contain the secret of creating a blade like the Zantetsuken. Lupin wants to steal them as a matter of family pride because his grandfather, Arsene Lupin, stole them back in the 19th century.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Napoleon once owned a deck of fortune-telling cards that are now in the hands of a millionaire known as Mr. Gold. Lupin plans to steal them during Mr. Gold's birthday party, and Zenigata plans to stop him. Lupin succeeds in stealing the mysterious cards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang aim to steal the blueprints for a new computer. In their way is a man skilled with the machinegun and his hit-man partner named Poon, who used to be Fujiko's partner in the past.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is posing as Lupin and blowing up bridges, causing a lot of damage and injuries. Lupin and Jigen discover that the bomber is trying to force an armored car to travel along a route of his choosing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are both after the legendary Eye of the Nile emerald. It is going to be a wedding gift presented at a wedding being held on a yacht.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Zenigata has been invited to an international police convention in Europe; his chief wants him to go, but Zenigata does not want to since Lupin has declared that he will steal a gold bust within the next three days.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko goads Lupin into stealing a large shipment of diamonds. Lupin takes the task despite Jigen's protest that Fujiko is playing them for fools. Of course, Jigen is right.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko invites Lupin and the gang to a famous nightclub owned by the sexy Hoshikage Rinko. Only Goemon refuses. This was a wise move as Rinko places timebombs on Fujiko, Jigen, and Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Mr. 2 is a man of many faces, but he finally shows his true colors when the marines attack the Straw Hats. Elsewhere, Vivi has a scheme up her sleeve, and it involves Igaram wearing a dress.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and his crew watch Alabasta fade into the distance, but there’s no time for reminiscing. The marines are in hot pursuit, and there’s a stowaway aboard the Going Merry!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Fresh off their adventure Alabasta, the Straw Hats discover an isolated island where they can restock their food supply. Chopper is left to guard the ship, but he and Nico spend the afternoon exploring instead!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: When a mail-order salesman gets lost at sea, Nami finds the paper she needs to start making maps. If the Straw Hat crew can somehow manage to survive a deadly cyclone, she might actually get some use out of it!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Heavy fog leads to a close encounter of the culinary kind when Nico fishes a marine out of the drink. The aspiring chef is concerned about the quality of his curry, and Sanji is just the guy to refine his recipe!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A break in the rain provides the perfect opportunity for Usopp to help a young girl fulfill her dream of launching the world’s largest firework.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Money troubles force Zoro to tangle with Dick the Bandit and his treacherous gang of thugs. These gun-toting outlaws are terrorizing a peaceful village, and the Straw Hat swordsman aims to stop their reign of terror!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A barrage of Marine cannon balls forces the Straw Hats to seek refuge on an uncharted island. Once ashore, the crew encounters a strange old man living amongst a herd of goats.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Old man Zenny made a fortune lending money to scallywags, but he always dreamed of becoming a pirate himself. When the marines set out to trap the Straw Hats, the wily hermit may finally get his wish!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zenny gets more than he bargained for when he embarks on his maiden pirate voyage. The Straw Hats may have made a friend for life, but what are they gonna do about those pesky marines?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats stop for supplies at a harbor town plagued by a mayor who taxes anything and everything. Over lunch, Luffy and Nico befriend a kooky scientist who’s obsessed with the Rainbow Mist.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy, Usopp, Nico, and Zoro get trapped in the Rainbow Mist along with Henzo. The aging scientist is looking for answers, the Straw Hats want treasure, and the ghosts who haunt the mist want them all to leave!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and his crew search for a way out of Ape’s Concert, but the Rainbow Mist is an inescapable maze of madness. Back on shore, Nami, Chopper, and Sanji face a lifetime of hard labor for failing to pay their taxes!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami enters the mist on a mission to save her mates – and maybe hunt for treasure while she’s at it. The local mayor wants her dead, but the Straw Hats are being protected by a mysterious marine.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The showdown with Mayor Wetton builds towards an explosive finale as the Straw Hats scramble to escape the Rainbow Mist – or be trapped inside forever.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats are nearly crushed by the falling wreckage of a ship that’s over 200 years old. Could rumors of a floating island in the sky be true? Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji go scuba diving to find out!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Still searching for a route to the island in the sky, the Straw Hats chart a course for Jaya. Meanwhile, Fire-Fist Ace crashes a party aboard a vessel helmed by Buggy the Pirate!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats drop anchor at a town overrun by scallywags, so Nami makes the boys swear to stay out of trouble. But when the Bellamy Pirates come looking for a fight, Luffy may have to break his promise!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nico’s handy work unearths a solitary dreamer who may know the way to Sky Island. All Luffy and his crew have to do is survive the sonic onslaught of simian salvagers seeking to sink the Going Merry!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and his mates reach the home of Mont Blanc Cricket: the man with the key to reaching Sky Island. There’s just one tiny problem – he comes from a long line of legendary liars.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Montblanc Cricket agrees to help the Straw Hats reach Sky Island, but first they must venture deep into the darkest depths of a spider-infested forest to capture a mysterious bird with a keen sense of direction.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While the Straw Hats battle creepy-crawly forest creatures on their quest to capture a South Bird, Mont Blanc and his monkey minions are brutally attacked by the Bellamy Pirates!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy turned the other cheek during his first encounter with Bellamy, but now he’s out to settle the score for old man Mont Blanc. Meanwhile, a fearsome pirate crew takes aim at the Straw Hats, eager to earn a bad reputation!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Thanks to some modifications to the Going Merry, the Straw Hats are on their way to that island in the sky! But with the Blackbeard Pirates in hot pursuit, navigating the vertical currents will be anything but easy.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Reaching the sea of clouds proves easier than surviving in it when giant sea creatures attack the Going Merry, Usopp nearly drowns in a cloud, and a strange sky knight issues the Straw Hats a warning!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After hitching a ride on a speedy shrimp, the Straw Hats reach the land of Skypiea! The intrepid pirates have much to learn about their new surroundings, but a beautiful angel makes a perfect tour guide.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nami’s eagerness to explore the forbidden realm of Upper Yard brings her face to face with the wrath of god, and the Straw Hats incur Heaven’s Judgment for failing to pay their immigration fees!

programme.desc: A serial sniper terrorizes the entire D.C. metro area by discreetly targeting random victims out in public and in plain sight.

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer

programme.title: Mark of a Serial Killer

programme.title: Sala de emergencias: Historias inéditas
programme.desc: El dolor en la pierna de una mujer embarazada resulta ser un virus carnívoro, que amenaza con su vida y sus extremidades.

programme.title: Sala de emergencias: Historias inéditas

programme.title: Sala de emergencias: Historias inéditas

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Rockland Cartright III is a beatnik who crashes his motorbike into a tree and recuperates at the Addams house. Each regards the other as an oddity, although the family learns to appreciate certain aspects of Rockland's life.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Mr. Briggs, the postman, is hired by the government to do undercover work in the Addams house. While pretending to be a stamp collector, he investigates rumors that coded radio messages are being sent from the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch's tiny fire-eating mother visits and demands that Lurch's employers wait on her boy hand-and-foot after Lurch leads her to believe that it's his house. Lurch revels in the unexpected attention he gets from Morticia and Gomez.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's electrical output fails abruptly. Should they call a doctor or an electrician to bring Fester back? Morticia prescribes a bowl of porcupine mold, and both she and Gomez agree that long exposure to moon rays would be beneficial.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family would like to vacation on the moon, but the billion-dollar travel cost is slightly prohibitive. Uncle Fester volunteers $21.13 and Morticia, using Gomez's new supercomputer, suggests placing a $2,000 bet on the daily double horse race.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Cousin Itt is advocated as curator of the local zoo. Gomez uses his influence with Park Commissioner Fisk (guest star Alan Reed) to promote Itt for the job, but the zookeepers are convinced the Addamses' cousin should be confined to a cage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama (Blossom Rock) is hauled off to jail for setting up a fortune-telling booth in the Addamses' living room. Gomez (John Astin) volunteers to act as attorney, and the court session becomes a shambles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez (John Astin) loses his memory after hitting his head; he fails to recognize Morticia (Carolyn Jones) and says the house looks like a condemned museum. The Addamses take turns hitting Gomez on the head trying to help him regain his memory.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Thing disappears from his box. Failing to find a single trace of Thing, Gomez (John Astin) conducts an investigation--with all members of the household under suspicion. Also starring Carolyn Jones, Jackie Coogan, and Ted Cassidy.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester applies for a job as an insurance salesman with the same company which is threatening to cancel the Addamses' policy (because Fester keeps blowing things up). Fester convinces the company interviewer that he is qualified for the job.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes inconsolable when Gomez donates the family antique harpsichord to a collector. Gomez and Morticia offer Lurch a balalaika and a set of drums. When this proves unsatisfactory, Gomez and Fester decide to build a new harpsichord.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Morticia hears the stock market has crashed, she assumes that Gomez has been financially wiped out and rallies the family to help make money. Morticia gives lessons, Lurch and Fester run an escort service, and the kids run a poison drink stand.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While enjoying a moonlight picnic and snail hunt, the Addams Family is mistaken for Martians by uniformed investigators from Mysterious Space Objects Headquarters. In turn, Gomez (John Astin) and the clan regard their inquisitors with suspicion.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: An organ grinder's fugitive monkey leads Fester to believe that he has turned Pugsley into a monkey. Morticia and Gomez treat the monkey as though he were their son, welcoming him to the dinner table and giving him Pugsley's chores.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's favorite charity is having an auction--so Morticia persuades her family to part with things to sell. Donations include Wednesday's headless doll, the old flogging table, a stuffed vulture and Uncle Fester's dynamite.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The Addams Family ignores notices that their house is to be condemned to make way for a freeway. When sudden explosions cannot be traced to any member of the family but, instead, to city workmen, Gomez is forced to consider moving the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's pen pal, Madelyn, is coming to visit. Fester panics, as he has described himself as handsome, heroic and romantic. Gomez and Morticia agree that all Fester needs is a toupee and they help him make several styles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez are worried about Cousin Itt because he spends his days sleeping and dreaming in his tiny room. They decide that Itt would make an excellent marriage counselor, and pretend to be a couple with a failing marriage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A recording company's platter of Lurch's gravelly voice brings a screaming mob of teenage fans to the Addams house. To calm the crowd, Lurch seats himself at the harpsichord and rewards his fans with a song to end all songs.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Taken in by a psychologist's pronouncement that the only happily married couples are those who fight members of the Addams household devise schemes to start a battle between Gomez (John Astin) and Morticia (Carolyn Jones).

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez decides to bolster Cousin Itt's failing ego by making him the star of a production aimed as a birthday surprise for Wednesday. He hires the great director, Eric von Bissell, who gives Itt elocution lessons, causing a Hollywood star complex.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While Morticia and Gomez are celebrating their 13th wedding anniversary, she tells Wednesday and Pugsley a bedtime story of how she and Gomez first met. In this episode, Carolyn Jones plays Morticia, Morticia as a 22-year-old, and sister Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley refuse to go to bed until they hear the rest of the courtship story. Morticia resumes the tale via flashback, including the ceremony beginning with Ophelia Frump, Morticia's balmy sister, as the bride.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Romance seems close for Thing, the Addams right-hand-in-a-box, when Gomez's aunt arrives for a visit accompanied by Lady Fingers, her handmaiden. Thing enjoys the visit most because it gives him a chance to hold hands with one of his own kind.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez visit Mayor Henson to complain that their property tax is ridiculously low. After the Mayor proves his incompetence by offering a refund, Gomez is persuaded to become a candidate for the office.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: During a welcome home party for Cousin Itt, Morticia notices that the diminutive guest of honor seems to be losing his hair. Uncle Fester experiments with his chemistry set to produce a concoction that grows hair and tries the remedy on Itt.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley return in tears from trick-or-treating because a neighbor has told them there is no such thing as a witch. Morticia and Gomez plan to prove to the children that they do exist--by summoning a witch to a séance.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Investigators rely on forensic odontology to identify a body from a single tooth and to catch two brutal killers from their bite marks.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: No matter how chaotic or how clean a crime scene appears to be, the culprit is bound to leave something telling behind. Occasionally, it's nothing more than a fingerprint or shoe tread. Sometimes that's all that's needed.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some people do get away with murder, at least for a while. Flush with their success, serial killers murder again and again. But each time they kill, they leave behind a few more clues, which ultimately lead to their undoing.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensic Entomology: Bugs have roamed the earth for 250 million years, but their intimate association with death is just now coming to life.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Forensic Sculpting: Forensic sculptors retrieve people from oblivion. Using clay and an intricate knowledge of anatomy, forensic arts place a face on an unidentified skull, recreating the victim's likeness, which often leads to his name.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Fingerprinting: The identification Division of the FBI relies on fingerprints as one of the most effective ways to identify criminals.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In New York, an ambitious college student has her whole life ahead of her, until she crosses the path of a killer. It's a random murder, the hardest kind to solve.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: At a crime scene, anything left behind or seemingly out of place is considered a clue. But a fire can extinguish everything in its path –challenging forensic investigators at every turn and making each arson a trial by fire.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Most victims of multiple murderers are meticulously chosen because of a mutual connection with the killer or because they match an intricate set of criteria that fits the killer's MO.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Investigators are always on the cutting edge of new forensic techniques that can help them solve cases more accurately. An experimental “brain fingerprinting” technique has already won the acquittal of a police officer accused of a drug charge.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For a price, anything's possible. Contract killings arose out of the need to establish the perfect alibi. By hiring someone else to do the dirty work, a person can deflect guilt, at least in theory.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The tiniest residue left at the scene can become a mark of distinction in the most singular and intimate of ways.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: 911 receives a desperate call in Fort Worth, Texas. A man's wife is shot. Forensic investigators search for clues in unlikely places, hoping the victim herself could provide information needed to determine how and why she died.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When killers hide or destroy the remains of their victims, it becomes the mission of forensic scientists to reconstruct the scenes and prove murder for an absent witness.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas agrees to take a job as an undercover agent and goes to investigate rumors of the sales of arms to renegade Indians. His life is endangered by the town drunk who stumbles onto his true identity.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While Lucas is in Wyoming on the trail of a gang illegally selling weapons to the Indians, Mark stays with Miss Milly, where he suffers from loneliness and doubt with his father gone for 2 months.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas looks for answers when recovering alcoholic Micah Torrence returns to the bottle and turns in his badge.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A deranged ex-prisoner of war, cruelly abused in a Northern army prison, captures Lucas, locks him in a cage and vows to make him suffer for his part in the Civil War.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas tries to get help when he is shot after witnessing a murder.

programme.desc: After being foreman of a jury that convicted an Apache, Lucas is marked for death. Now, he must discover who is behind the curse.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Two pranksters write away for a mail-order bride, using Lucas's name.

programme.desc: Championship pool player Fats Brown returns from the grave for one last game.

programme.desc: A gung-ho young soldier gets a new viewpoint on war when he inexplicably changes places with a Japanese officer trying to stop his superior from leading a charge against American forces.

programme.desc: A lonely old woman refuses to leave her apartment for fear of meeting "Mr. Death."

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Paul Radin has invited three people to join him in his bomb shelter.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A vagrant steps into a murdered gangster's expensive shoes and is taken over by the dead man's ghost, who vows to remain on Earth to seek revenge against his killer.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: On a hunting trip, Hyder Simpson and his dog Rip dive into a lake after a raccoon. When he gets home he finds that no one can see or hear him.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Actor Rance McGrew makes TV Westerns for a living, but he's a lousy actor and a worse cowboy. Despite that, each week he "wins" against the bad guys. Finally, the bad guys have had enough and decide to teach McGrew a lesson.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The senior residents of Sunnyvale decide that the secret to youth is acting young, and in particular playing a childhood game called "kick-the-can."

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie, Lydia y Elijah ayudan a Aaron y a Gabriel en una misión de rescate. En medio del caos, Negan vigila a Hershel. Sebastian fuerza a Daryl y Rosita a realizar un atraco.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Carol y Pamela hacen un trato de borrón y cuenta nueva en nombre de sus amigos. Aaron, Jerry, Lydia y Elijah se marchan hacia Oceanside para hablarles de un plan. La Commonwealth celebra el Día de los Fundadores.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Eugene huye después del incidente del Día de los Fundadores. Pamela le pide a Mercer que investigue dónde está, para disgusto de Max y La Princesa. Por otro lado, Aaron, Jerry, Lydia y Elijah se topan con un contratiempo peculiar.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl y Carol investigan el paradero de sus amigos después de que Pamela los hiciera desaparecer de la Commonwealth. Por desgracia, su única pista es Hornsby. Por otro lado, Pamela le pide a Yumiko que procese a Eugene en nombre de la Commonwealth.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Después de separarse de sus hijos, Maggie, Gabriel y Rosita siguen un convoy militar hasta un destino misterioso. Ezekiel, Kelly, Negan y Annie acaban en una zona de obras. Daryl y Carol siguen a un tren que lleva a Connie a bordo.

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Ask This Old House

programme.title: Ask This Old House

programme.title: Terence Crawford vs Jose Benavidez Jr
programme.desc: On October 13th, 2018, Terence Crawford fought Jose Benavidez Jr for the WBO World Welterweight Title in Omaha, Nebraska. In a dominant performance, Crawford showed out in front of his hometown, delivering a TKO in the final round.

programme.title: Terence Crawford vs Julius Indongo
programme.desc: On August 19th, 2017 Terence Crawford fought Julius Indongo for the IBF, WBA, WBC and WBO World Super Lightweight titles at the Pinnacle Bank Arena in Lincoln the bout ended in the third round by knockout securing the victory for Crawford.

programme.title: Terence Crawford vs Kell Brook
programme.desc: On November 14th, 2020 Terence Crawford battled Kell Brook for the WBO World Welterweight title in The Bubble at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas resulting in a fourth round technical knockout victory for Crawford.

programme.title: Terence Crawford vs Shawn Porter
programme.desc: On November 20th, 2021, Terence Crawford fought Shawn Porter for the WBO World Welterweight Title at the Mandalay Bay in Las Vegas. In a very close fight, Crawford turned it up and put on the pressure late, delivering a TKO in the 10th round.

programme.title: Terence Crawford vs Thomas Dulorme
programme.desc: On April 18th, 2015, Terence Crawford fought Thomas Dulorme for the WBO World Super Lightweight Title in Arlington, Texas. Putting on the pressure and showing his aggressive style, Crawford scored three knockdowns in the sixth round to get the TKO.

programme.title: Terence Crawford vs Viktor Postol
programme.desc: On July 23rd, 2016, Terence Crawford fought Viktor Postol for the WBO and WBC World Super Lightweight Titles at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas. Scoring two knockdowns, Crawford dominated the fight, earning a much deserved unanimous decision victory.

programme.title: Terence Crawford vs Yuriorkis Gamboa
programme.desc: On June 28th, 2014, Terence Crawford fought Yuriorkis Gamboa for the WBO Lightweight Title at Century Link Center in Omaha. In Top Rank's 2014 Fight of the Year, Terence Crawford shined in front of his hometown, stopping Gamboa in the ninth round.

programme.title: Thomas Hearns vs Juan Domingo Roldan
programme.desc: On October 29th, 1987 Thomas Hearns faced Juan Domingo Roldan for the vacant WBC World Middleweight title at the Las Vegas Hilton the 12 round bout went only 4 rounds ending with a knockout by Hearns securing the victory.

programme.title: Thomas Hearns vs Roberto Duran
programme.desc: On June 15th, 1984 Thomas Hearns fought Roberto Duran for WBC World Super Welterweight title at Caesars Palace in Las Vegas that resulted in a technical knockout victory in the second round by Hearns.

programme.title: Timothy Bradley vs Manny Pacquiao I
programme.desc: On June 9th, 2012 Manny Pacquiao and Timothy Bradley started their trilogy at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas in a battle for the WBO World Welterweight title that ended in a split decision win for Timothy Bradley.

programme.title: Tommy Morrison vs George Foreman
programme.desc: On June 7th, 1993 Tommy Morrison battled George Foreman for the WBO world heavyweight title at the Thomas & Mack Center in Las Vegas with Foreman getting a point deducted in round ten the bout resulted in a victory for Morrison.

programme.title: Naoya Inoue vs Nonito Donaire II
programme.desc: On June 7th, 2022 Naoya Inoue battled Nonoito Donaire for a second time at the Super Arena in Saitama for IBF, WBA and WBC World Bantamweight title with Inoue ending the bout in the second round defeating Donaire.

programme.title: Nonito Donaire vs Jorge Arce
programme.desc: On December 15th, 2012 Nonito Donaire faced Jorge Arce at the Toyota Center in Houston, Tx. With the bout ending in the third round with a win by Donaire, Arce announced his retirement in the ring after the bout.

programme.title: Orlando Salido vs Juan Manuel Lopez 2
programme.desc: On March 10th, 2012, Orlando Salido fought Juan Manuel Lopez for the WBO World Featherweight Title in San Juan, Puerto Rico. In a very entertaining fight with both fighters scoring knockdowns, Salido stopped Lopez in the 10th round.

programme.title: Oscar De La Hoya vs Fernado Vargas
programme.desc: On September 14th, 2002, Oscar De La Hoya and Fernando Vargas fought for Super Welterweight titles at the Mandalay Bay in Las Vegas. In an incredible battle, De La Hoya was able to stop Vargas in the 11th round.

programme.title: Oscar Valdez vs Miguel Berchelt
programme.desc: On February 20th, 2021 Oscar Valdez and Miguel Berchelt faced eachother for the WBC World Super Featherweight title during "The Bubble" at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas with Berchelt going down three times Valdez scared the win in the 10th round.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Foes Jungle Grrrl and The Beast are forced to put aside their differences to battle The Monsters of Madness, Havok, and Hazard. Can the two animals of the ring coexist long enough to secure victory? The Tag Team Championship Series continues.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The animals of the ring, The Beast and Jungle Grrrl battle to determine dominance. Meanwhile, WOW World Champion Tessa Blanchard seizes an opportunity to settle a score.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: After months of being bullied, Stephy Slays finally gets her shot at revenge against The Governor’s Daughter, Abilene Maverick. The Tag Team Championship continues when The Monsters of Madness battle The Dixie Darlings, Jolene, and Jolynn.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Champion Tessa Blanchard and The Greatest Attorney in the World, Sophia Lopez conspire In an attempt to derail The Beast’s path to The WOW World Championship Title by placing The Norweigen Nightmare, Nikki Krampus in her way.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Anticipation builds as Jungle Grrrl gets a rematch against The Beast to determine the rightful contender to the WOW World Championship. To ensure a fair outcome, Champion Tessa Blanchard has been barred from ringside.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Jungle Grrrl calls out The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard for her Championship Match. With her back against the well, Tessa is forced to get creative and strikes a deal with The Fabulous Lana Star. Will The Fabulous One help Tessa Blanchard or turn on her?

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: The Beast calls out The Fabulous Lana Star for costing her a shot at The WOW World Championship. And Jungle Grrrl finally battles The Born Legend, Tessa Blanchard for the WOW World Championship in The Main Event.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)
programme.desc: Chaos, disorder, bedlam, and madness are all promised in a high-stakes Three-Way Elimination between The Monsters of Madness, Havok and Hazard, Holidead and Siren The Voodoo Doll, & Adrenaline and Fire.

programme.title: WOW - Women Of Wrestling (Classic)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from… Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel. If he loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Cat plays a trick on Sam using a pair of twins that they are a babysitting; Sam retaliates with a prank on Cat.

programme.title: Sam & Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat are ordered to rename their babysitting business because it is too similar to a television show from the 1970s.

programme.title: Victorious: Tori Fixes Beck & Jade
programme.desc: Beck wants to ask a girl out but is worried about Jade's reaction, so Tori and Andre attempt to get Jade a date to even the playing field. Robbie works to remove a butterfly stuck in Cat's ear.

programme.title: Victorious: Robbie Sells Rex
programme.desc: Mason Thornesmith's bratty 12-year-old kid wants to buy Rex from Robbie. Meanwhile, a masked flour thrower is on the loose in Hollywood Arts.

programme.title: Victorious: The Bad Roommate
programme.desc: Andre stays with Tori to work on a song for class. They quickly find they aren't the best roommates. Jade discovers an unflattering picture of herself on the internet, and conspires to take it down.

programme.title: Victorious: Victori-Yes
programme.desc: Sikowitz challenges the students to say yes to everything for one week. The gang agrees, and they soon find themselves out of their respective comfort zones.

programme.title: Victorious: Brain Squeezers
programme.desc: Tori is selected to be the team captain for a new game show, Brain Squeezers. She has to choose 3 teammates to compete with her and quickly becomes overwhelmed by requests from the gang.

programme.title: Victorious: Star-Spangled Tori
programme.desc: When Tori gets invited to sing the national anthem at a televised basketball game, she worries she'll forget the lyrics, but ends up in a much more embarrassing encounter with the team's mascot.

programme.title: Victorious: One Thousand Berry Balls
programme.desc: Andre gets Tori a job at a frozen yogurt stand, but work may keep them from performing at the Hollywood Arts Cowboy Luau. Robbie wants to ask Cat to the luau, but asks someone else, making Cat jealous.

programme.title: Victorious: The Slap Fight
programme.desc: Tori and the gang compete to see who can get the most followers on The Slap. But when they get caught up in the competition, they neglect their schoolwork and their friendships.

programme.title: Victorious: Tori Goes Platinum
programme.desc: Tori wins a contest to sing the opening number at a big music awards show, but the producer wants to totally change her look and behavior. Tori agrees, but finds that she doesn't like her new image.

programme.title: Victorious: Freak the Freak Out
programme.desc: Tori's friends sing at a local karaoke club and end up competing with a pair of stuck-up girls who are regular performers there. Competing with those girls proves to be more difficult than they expect, since one of the girls' father owns the club.

programme.title: Victorious: Pilot
programme.desc: After Tori fills in for her ailing sister in a big musical showcase, Tori is asked to enroll at an elite performing arts high school. But once there, Tori struggles to fit in to her new surroundings.

programme.title: Victorious: The Bird Scene
programme.desc: Tori goes all out to master an iconic Hollywood Arts monologue in Sikowitz's class. Meanwhile, André and Robbie join a ballet class to meet girls, with disastrous results.

programme.title: Victorious: Stage Fighting
programme.desc: Tori has to defend herself after Jade claims Tori hurt her in a stage fighting exercise. Meanwhile, Trina has to fend off Robbie's advances when he thinks their stage kiss meant something.

programme.title: Victorious: Beck's Big Break
programme.desc: Tori accidentally gets Beck fired from a small role in a movie, then must figure out a way to get him his job back. Meanwhile, Robbie suffers frightening nightmares about his best friend Rex.

programme.title: Victorious: Tori the Zombie
programme.desc: Tori gets the lead in a high profile school musical, but freaks out when a stage makeup project goes awry, and she's left looking like a zombie on opening night.

programme.title: Victorious: Jade Dumps Beck
programme.desc: After a jealous Jade dumps Beck, she soon regrets it and recruits Tori to help get him back. Meanwhile, Trina puts on a one-woman show and tells Robbie he better give it a good review… or else!

programme.title: Victorious: The Birthweek Song
programme.desc: Tori struggles to find the perfect birthday gift for Trina, then decides to write her sister a song as a present. An ungrateful Trina turns the song into cash by selling it, enraging Tori.

programme.title: Victorious: Robarazzi
programme.desc: Tori suggests Robbie capture videos of students' everyday lives to increase his blog traffic, but when the camera is turned on Tori, she asks him to stop. Only Robbie doesn't and Tori realizes she's created a monster.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Carly, Sam, and Freddie defeat a famous TV chef in a cooking challenge, the chef gives up cooking, quits his show, and refuses to come out of his bedroom. Spencer tries to make his vision of the future a reality.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Carly, Sam, and Freddie accidentally get Principal Franklin fired, Miss Briggs and Mr. Howard take control and enforce harsh rules. Meanwhile, Spencer hires a grizzled old rodeo star to teach him to ride a mechanical bull.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Sam announces a "take Carly to the dance contest" for an upcoming Girls' Choice dance, so many boys show up that Carly, Sam, and Freddie have to hold a speed-dating session to meet them all.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Carly, Sam, and Freddie agree to make a music video for a pop star who's trying to make a comeback, they discover that she is out of shape and untalented. Spencer has trouble dating a woman when he discovers she's Gibby's mom.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Freddie saves Carly's life, Carly falls in love with him. Meanwhile, Sam and Spencer compete against each other in a paintball game called Assassin.

programme.title: iCarly
programme.desc: When Gibby discovers Freddie and his girlfriend in a compromising position, he vows revenge and challenges Freddie to a fight. Meanwhile, Spencer's art career really takes off when the local paper incorrectly reports his death.
